question: Ram Ray, who recently passed away, belongs to which profession?
explanation: Advertising giant Ram Ray died on November 12, 2019 after a prolonged illness. He was 77. Ray worked as the chief of many Indian and international advertising and marketing firms, headed J. Walter Thompson USA, as the only non-American. In his advertising career spanning more than 40 years, Ray worked with over 200 diverse clients. His passion, dedication, talent and creativity gave him recognition with titles such as ‘Ad Guru and Doyen of Indian Advertising’.
